attributes.action: End the political discrimination against foreign journalists and intellectuals.
attributes.background: We must end the political discrimination of people such as Lauren Southern and journalists who have been refused entry to the UK under the facade of Racism. A crime they have never committed, been charged with or been convicted of and has been decided by the Home Office without any evidence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
